pages.text: Rich Soil is a special type of soil that accelerates natural growth. It shortens the preparation time for saplings to grow. If the block above Rich Soil is air, it has a chance to randomly generate brown or red mushrooms. These mushrooms can later grow into full mushroom colonies over time.

Rich Soil can be tilled with a hoe to create Rich Soil Farmland. Crops planted on Rich Soil Farmland continues growing even when the ambient temperature or moisture slightly deviated from their normal growth range.

You can craft organic compost and place it in the world. The Compost will eventually become a rich soil block over time. Water, sky light, other rich soil blocks and mushrooms can accelerate the conversion.
